mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTING(TITLE, NUM, AFFIL, NAME, SCORE) VALUES (#{title}, #{num}, #{affil}, #{name}, #{score})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM VOTING WHERE NUM = #{num} AND TITLE = #{title}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VOTED(TITLE, MEMBER_ID, NUM) VALUES (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VOTED WHERE TITLE = #{title} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
